alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 29 at 7:44AM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph are expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph are possible in the hills. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Eastern San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects such as lawn furniture.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
